plot: Questions about Danielle's brother are left unanswered, angering the group at Rachel's beach brunch. Previously undisclosed sibling drama is on full display when Teresa and Joe reveal their unique sides of a family secret. Jackie tests Teresa's boundaries as Rachel calls Danielle out for spreading rumors. Louie attempts to help mend Teresa's issues, but it backfires when Teresa, Joe and Melissa exchange words that cause them to divide even more.—Anonymous
